{{champion:77}} Our rage is beyond your control.

Mute. Honestly it is simple and over said, but if people start to get under your skin this can help a lot.

If it is really bad, I think you can unbind your enter key in options, so you literally can't type.

You could play with a friend, and ask him/her to tell you to stop when you are starting to rage.

Just a couple of ideas.
